name: Love Nest
description:
Your bird friend sings about the things they find beautiful. Find the materials that create the song to build a nest and WOO! YOUR! LOVE!

Arrow keys or WASD to move. Spacebar to interact. Wow!

Sorry there's no exit button right now, so you'll have to force quit :|

Created during Global Game Jam 2019!

  • Art by Alex Privee
  • Code by Qristy Overton
  • Even more code by Drew Gingerich
  • Music by Aaron Minnick
